title: Given a date/time, facet only by time
description: Given a field that is indexed as date/time, it would be great if range faceting could facet only on date or only on time as an option.  For instance, given a months worth of date, I'd like to be able to see what are the hotspots during throughout the day.  Now, I could index a separate time field, but that seems redundant, as the data is already there.

comments.author: Vitaliy Zhovtyuk
comments.content: Added code to group facet range counts by date parts: date and time separately.
